name: ae-script-runner
description: Run Adobe After Effects ExtendScript code directly from Visual Studio Code.

commands.title: AE: Run ExtendScript in After Effects

aeScriptRunner.saveBeforeRun.description: Save the current file before sending it to After Effects.

aeScriptRunner.tempFile.description: Path to a temporary file used when the active document is untitled (no saved location). For saved files, temporary files are created in the same directory as the file being edited.

aeScriptRunner.executeFile.description: Optional: always execute this file instead of the current editor's document. Provide a relative or absolute path.

aeScriptRunner.winAfterEffectsExe.description: Windows only: path to the AfterFX.exe executable used to run scripts via the -r switch.

aeScriptRunner.macAfterEffectsBundle.description: macOS only: bundle identifier for After Effects. Use 'auto' for automatic detection, 'com.adobe.AfterEffects.application' for AE 2025+, 'com.adobe.AfterEffects' for AE 2024, or 'com.adobe.aftereffects' for legacy versions.
